description:
A supervised dissertation (10,000 - 12,000 words) on a writing, editing, and publishing topic. Students must have completed, or be concurrently enrolled in, WRIT7005 Research Techniques, and have a minimum cumulative GPA of 5.5.

Enrolment in this course requires departmental permission and is subject to the availability of an appropriate supervisor. WRIT7110 is for part-time students commencing in semester 1.
prerequisites: Completion of or concurrent enrolment in WRIT7005 + minimum cumulative GPA of 5.5
